hero.title: All your notes and bookmarks in one visual timeline.
hero.text: A beautiful flow of all your notes, bookmarks, and Pocket saves, in one visual timeline. A pleasure to organize, scan, and find what you need.

facets.title: Tag Categorize Prioritize
facets.text: Flow brings together different kinds of data that’s usually collected separately. You get a comprehensive view and the ability to organize in a way that makes perfect sense to you.

facets.title: Scan and Filter
facets.text: Everything you save to Flow is easy to find. Just flip through your timeline, or filter by categories and tags to quickly find just what you need.

facets.title: Form and function
facets.text: Choose a color scheme to organize your Flow, or create one that suits you.

facets.title: It travels with you
facets.text: Access Flow across your devices. It’ll sync between your web browser and apps.
